title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Sky News hosts Laura Jayes and Peter Stefanovic have clashed with the organisers of a protest to shut down a mining conference in Melbourne. Climate activist Jacob Andrewartha told Sky News it was his “right” to shut down the International Mining and Resources Conference at the Convention Centre by forming a blockade of 300 people. Ms Jayes said climate activists would lose support from normal people by trying to bring a city to a standstill. “Why do 200 to 300 people have their arrogance to hold a whole city to ransom … you think you are going to get supporters by doing this?” Mr Andrewartha said the disruption to the city was not as bad as a “climate emergency” and labelled mining workers “criminals”. “We have a right to organise a mass number of protestors, like this, with the aim of shutting down the mining conference and making these climate criminals accountable.”
